title: What is CS0227?
labels: All compiler errors have to be fixed

sections.title: Symptoms
content: error CS0227: Unsafe code requires the `unsafe' command line option to be specified

sections.title: Cause
content: The CS0227 error is caused when you have added the unsafe keyword to a method but have not specified the command line option.

sections.title: Resolution
content: To fix the CS0227 error you will need to tell the compiler that you will be using pointers an any methods marked with the unsafe keyword. This article will show you how to do it for the Editor and the iOS
